DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample blood bone marrow laboratory patient cancer may help doctor learn change occur DNA identify gene related cancer . It may also help doctor diagnose cancer predict patient respond treatment . PURPOSE : This research study identify cancer-related gene blood and/or bone marrow sample patient acute myeloid leukemia .
DOC.brief_title: Identifying Cancer Genes Blood Bone Marrow Samples From Patients With Acute Myeloid Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To identify validate individual gene diagnosis three major translocation acute myeloid leukemia . - To correlate transcript expression data various translocation age , sex , race , response treatment , survival know mutation . OUTLINE : Blood and/or bone marrow sample previously procure patient CALGB-9665 obtained CALGB Leukemia Tissue Bank patient enrol CALGB AML treatment study . Mononuclear cell isolate sample mRNA extract . Gene expression profile analyze via custom mRNA microarray confirm quantitative real-time PCR .
